verses.text: Hear \w this|strong="H1121"\w*, all you peoples. Listen, all you inhabitants \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H1121"\w* world,
\w both|strong="H3605"\w* low \w and|strong="H5971"\w* high, rich \w and|strong="H5971"\w* poor \w together|strong="H8085"\w*.
\w My|strong="H1571"\w* mouth \w will|strong="H1571"\w* speak words \w of|strong="H1121"\w* wisdom. \w My|strong="H1571"\w* heart \w will|strong="H1571"\w* utter understanding.

\w I|strong="H3820"\w* \w will|strong="H3820"\w* incline \w my|strong="H1696"\w* ear \w to|strong="H1696"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* proverb. \w I|strong="H3820"\w* \w will|strong="H3820"\w* solve \w my|strong="H1696"\w* riddle \w on|strong="H1696"\w* \w the|strong="H1696"\w* harp.
Why should I fear \w in|strong="H4912"\w* \w the|strong="H5186"\w* days \w of|strong="H4912"\w* evil, when iniquity \w at|strong="H2420"\w* \w my|strong="H6605"\w* heels surrounds me?

\w Those|strong="H5437"\w* \w who|strong="H4100"\w* trust \w in|strong="H3117"\w* \w their|strong="H3117"\w* wealth, \w and|strong="H3117"\w* boast \w in|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H3117"\w* multitude \w of|strong="H3117"\w* \w their|strong="H3117"\w* riches—

none \w of|strong="H7230"\w* \w them|strong="H5921"\w* can \w by|strong="H5921"\w* any means redeem \w his|strong="H5921"\w* brother, nor \w give|strong="H1984"\w* God \w a|strong="H3068"\w* ransom \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w him|strong="H5921"\w*.

\w For|strong="H5414"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* \w redemption|strong="H6299"\w* \w of|strong="H3808"\w* \w their|strong="H5414"\w* life \w is|strong="H3808"\w* costly, \w no|strong="H3808"\w* payment \w is|strong="H3808"\w* \w ever|strong="H3808"\w* enough,
\w that|strong="H5315"\w* \w he|strong="H5315"\w* should live on \w forever|strong="H5769"\w*, \w that|strong="H5315"\w* \w he|strong="H5315"\w* should \w not|strong="H2308"\w* see corruption.

\w For|strong="H2421"\w* \w he|strong="H3808"\w* \w sees|strong="H7200"\w* \w that|strong="H7200"\w* wise men die; likewise \w the|strong="H7200"\w* fool \w and|strong="H7200"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* senseless perish, \w and|strong="H7200"\w* \w leave|strong="H2421"\w* \w their|strong="H7200"\w* \w wealth|strong="H3808"\w* \w to|strong="H7200"\w* others.

\w Their|strong="H7200"\w* inward thought \w is|strong="H3684"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w their|strong="H7200"\w* houses \w will|strong="H2450"\w* endure forever, \w and|strong="H7200"\w* \w their|strong="H7200"\w* dwelling places \w to|strong="H4191"\w* \w all|strong="H3162"\w* generations. \w They|strong="H3588"\w* name \w their|strong="H7200"\w* lands \w after|strong="H3588"\w* themselves.

\w But|strong="H5921"\w* man, \w despite|strong="H5921"\w* \w his|strong="H7121"\w* riches, doesn’t \w endure|strong="H5769"\w*. \w He|strong="H1004"\w* \w is|strong="H8034"\w* \w like|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* animals \w that|strong="H7121"\w* perish.
\w This|strong="H3885"\w* is \w the|strong="H3885"\w* destiny of those who \w are|strong="H1077"\w* foolish, \w and|strong="H3366"\w* of those who approve their sayings. \qs Selah.\qs*

\w They|strong="H6310"\w* \w are|strong="H1870"\w* appointed \w as|strong="H6310"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* flock \w for|strong="H2088"\w* Sheol.\f + \fr 49:14 \ft Sheol is the place of the dead.\f* Death \w shall|strong="H6310"\w* \w be|strong="H1870"\w* \w their|strong="H1870"\w* shepherd. \w The|strong="H1870"\w* upright \w shall|strong="H6310"\w* \w have|strong="H2088"\w* dominion over \w them|strong="H2088"\w* \w in|strong="H1870"\w* \w the|strong="H1870"\w* \w morning|strong="H2088"\w*. \w Their|strong="H1870"\w* beauty \w shall|strong="H6310"\w* decay \w in|strong="H1870"\w* Sheol,\f + \fr 49:14 \ft Sheol is the place of the dead. \f* far from \w their|strong="H1870"\w* mansion.

But God \w will|strong="H3477"\w* redeem \w my|strong="H7462"\w* soul \w from|strong="H3477"\w* \w the|strong="H7462"\w* power \w of|strong="H4194"\w* \w Sheol|strong="H7585"\w*,\f + \fr 49:15 \ft Sheol is the place of the dead.\f* \w for|strong="H6629"\w* \w he|strong="H1242"\w* \w will|strong="H3477"\w* receive me. \qs Selah.\qs*

Don’t \w be|strong="H3027"\w* afraid \w when|strong="H3588"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w man|strong="H5315"\w* \w is|strong="H5315"\w* \w made|strong="H3947"\w* rich, \w when|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* glory \w of|strong="H3027"\w* \w his|strong="H3947"\w* house \w is|strong="H5315"\w* increased;

\w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w when|strong="H3588"\w* \w he|strong="H3588"\w* dies \w he|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H1004"\w* carry nothing away. \w His|strong="H3588"\w* \w glory|strong="H3519"\w* won’t descend \w after|strong="H3588"\w* \w him|strong="H7235"\w*.

\w Though|strong="H3588"\w* \w while|strong="H3588"\w* \w he|strong="H3588"\w* lived \w he|strong="H3588"\w* blessed \w his|strong="H3605"\w* \w soul|strong="H3519"\w*— \w and|strong="H3381"\w* \w men|strong="H3605"\w* \w praise|strong="H3588"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w when|strong="H3588"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w do|strong="H3605"\w* well \w for|strong="H3588"\w* yourself—

\w he|strong="H3588"\w* \w shall|strong="H5315"\w* \w go|strong="H3190"\w* \w to|strong="H5315"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* generation \w of|strong="H5315"\w* \w his|strong="H1288"\w* fathers. \w They|strong="H3588"\w* \w shall|strong="H5315"\w* never see \w the|strong="H3588"\w* light.

\w A|strong="H3068"\w* \w man|strong="H7200"\w* \w who|strong="H3808"\w* \w has|strong="H5331"\w* riches \w without|strong="H3808"\w* understanding, \w is|strong="H1755"\w* \w like|strong="H3808"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* animals \w that|strong="H7200"\w* perish.
